Clickability

I have been doing a lot of work with Clickability lately. There is a Firefox plugin for Clickability and their admin works best with Firefox. However, I prefer to use Chrome so I decided to make this Google Chrome extension to allow me to work with the platform more effectively.

I used the Firefox plugin, Clickability Developer written by Don Sami as inspiration for my own Chrome extension.

Click the Link bellow to install the Chrome extension:

Clickability Extension in the Chrome Web Store

I have also made the code for this extension available on GitHub at: https://github.com/dbald/Clickability-Chrome-Extension. So please feel free to help me make this extension better.

I have also written a couple bookmark-lets that can be used on any browser. Just drag the links below to your bookmarks bar on your browser.

  • Clickability: Cache Bust
  • Clickability: Basic Debug
  • Clickability: Extended Debug
  • Clickability: Full Debug
  • Clickability: Toggle Help Text
